hooks.prompt: IMPORTANT: Before editing, verify you have READ this file in the current conversation. If not, read it first to understand context.

hooks.command: fp=$(echo $TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.file_path // .filePath // empty'); [ -z "$fp" ] && exit 0; [[ "$fp" == *.dart ]] && dart format "$fp" 2>/dev/null; exit 0

hooks.prompt: Before completing: If Dart/Flutter files were modified, remind user to run `flutter analyze && flutter test` if not already done.
